view_hport: This variable can be used to get or to set the height of the specified view port. The height of the view port (or combined view ports if more than one are active) define the height of the game window or background canvas at the start of the game, so changing this value after the game has started will have no visible effect on the game window size unless called along with the function window_set_size().
